productDescription:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.

optionalInfo.fit:
The JEAN_jacket fits a little oversized.

Alexander wears size M/L-Tall in and is 187cm.

Sizes in CM:
S/M(-Tall)
Chest circumference 102cm
sleevelength measured from the neck 83cm (88cm)
length 59cm (64cm)

M/L(-Tall)
chest circumference 108cm
sleevelength measured from the neck 84cm (89cm)
lengte 60cm (65cm)

L/XL(-Tall)
borstomtrek 114cm
sleevelength measured from the neck 85cm (90cm)
length 61cm (66cm)
optionalInfo.care: Wash this piece on max 30°C, don’t bleach it, let it line dry, don’t use chemicals while cleaning/washing and iron between 1-2 points.
optionalInfo.production:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: The jacket is handmade and will be made after your order. Therefore the delivery time will take between 1 -5 days on average.
